Actions.Name: Claw Slam
Actions.Effects: The crab can spend additional actions on this attack. Every extra action it spends on it gives it bonus damage and +1 boon.

Actions.Name: Water Jet
Actions.Description: The Crab creates a line 5 area effect drawn adjacent to it while in this stance. When the crab moves, it can reposition this effect, but reduces its size by 1. Characters that move into the area or start their turn there take 2 damage, are shoved 3 and must save or become winded and frostbitten. Frostbitten foes fail this save and take [fray] damage instead. When the area reaches 0, the stance ends.
